H0.text: Which town is home to the University of Ulster. Belfast

H1.text: Which town is home to the University of Ulster. Derry

H2.text: Which town is home to the University of Ulster. Jordanstown

H3.text: Which town is home to the University of Ulster. Cowlraine

A4.text: Ulster University has a campus located in Derry (Magee College).

A5.text: Ulster University has a campus located in Jordanstown.

A6.text: Ulster University has a campus located in Belfast.

A7.text: Belfast has two universities, including Ulster University.
